name: How To Mech Friends and Influence Goblings
name_original: How To Mech Friends and Influence Goblings
description:
How to Mech Friends and Influence Goblings:

You are a pale little Gobling named Iffs, and you don't have many friends. Well, you don't have ANY to be precise. But it won't stay that way forever, not if you can BUILD a friend! Although, getting all the parts means you'll have to venture into Scrap-Town...where all the other Goblings are...

My entry into the Mech (Bitsy Jam).

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Use your arrow keys to or WASD to navigate your surroundings and to interact with objects.

CREDITS:

Made in Adam Le Doux's Bitsy, using  Andrew Yolland's Borksy to integrate a number of incredibly useful hacks.

Music by Caeth.
